title: Bes19
author: Bes19
content: Hello everyone!It's been years since the last time I've been here. So I was trying to make a new post for a project but it seems like IMGUR is not working anymore when adding an image to a post.Or am I doing it wrong? Do you guys know what image hosting site should I use to post an image here?Thank you!

comments.author: OmegaStarScream
comments.body: No, you're not wrong. It's not working for a few weeks now. As an alternative, you can use TalkImg which is made by one of the forum members[1][2].[1] https://talkimg.com/[2] https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5450546.0

comments.body: Talkimg, imgbb, postingimages etc.There are still many more third party hosting sites.If you're want to access your old pictures that you posted in the past you can solve it through this thread [get yours] Images from imgur + All links to your own posts
